metadata.Title: CVE-2018-6197 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium.
metadata.Description:
w3m through 0.5.3 is prone to a NULL pointer dereference flaw in formUpdateBuffer in form.c.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-6197` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

w3m - 0.5.3-15ubuntu0.2
w3m-img - 0.5.3-15ubuntu0.2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: w3m package in trusty was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '0.5.3-15ubuntu0.2').
